title: Sande sikul i kal ang u
lyrics:
Sande sikul i kal ang u,
Mi tin tan a lo ni si;
A pui a pang kai ho zel se,
A hmei a pa tan a ni.

Lo kal r'u, a that chu,
Kan ramah zung kai sela;
Hemi hi a hlu si,
Kan hnam a chawimawi ang a.

Baibul chhiarin an ngaihtuah thin,
Pathian leh mihring thu hlu;
Thu lau, mi a phak tawk a awm,
A thuk pawh, Pathian rilru.

Krista chanchin mawi duhawmte,
Chhandam kawngte min hrilh chu;
Dam lai chet mawi theih min zirtir,
Thih muan theihna min kawhhmuh.
